newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Forum buys steel shares from Wing Tiek.
newsitem.headline: Forum buys steel shares from Wing Tiek.

text.p: Newly converted holding firm Forum Pacific Inc said on Thursday it had bought 15.750 million shares of National Steel Corp (NSC) from Wing Tiek Holdings Bhd.
The buy-in is estimated at 204.750 million pesos.
The acquisition gives Forum 3.0 to 5.0 percent stake in NSC, a Forum official said.
"The investment is in line with the company's strategy to look for alternative investments with high earnings potential," Forum president Peter Salud told the Philippine Stock Exchange.
In October, Wing Tiek completed a deal with the Philippine government, buying 75 percent of National Steel Company which was then a state-owned company.
